Summary: Sitting at stoplight taking photos of a Fire Truck, I took four photos each from 2-7 seconds apart and the object appears in the last photo
divs: Sighting DetailsI was taking photographs at an intersection in Louisville, Colorado of a fire truck. I take about 275 photos on the way home from work each day and usually about the same amount on the way to work. I had the sunroof open and while stopped simply put my arm through the sunroof and started taking pictures. I was going to delete the photos after looking at them and upon finding a roundish object in the distance I decide to keep all four for reference. The photo taken immediately before this photo was taken at 15:44:02 and seven seconds later at 15:44:09 this object appeared in the next photo submitted. Enlarged it appears to be directly over the low buildings seen in the distance. I did not see this object. I was only taking photographs hoping something would show up and as usually I was not surprised to find something. Since I take on average 7000 photos a week I will always get something interesting. The first photo is original, the second enlarged with color correction.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Louisville
There were no other sightings in Louisville on or around July 21st 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
